problem.title: CheckPoint: Work and Kinetic Energy
problem.script: aa=random.choice([0.6,3.0,6.0]) bb=random.choice([0.8,4.0,8.0]) cc=random.choice([0.2,4.0,5.0]) k=35* aa/3+5* bb/2+5* cc
problem.p: An object of mass m = 5.0 kg is moving along the x-axis, acted upon by a single force \(F(x)=$aa x^2 + $bb x + $cc \) N. Find the change in the kinetic energy of the object as it moves from \( x_i = -2.0 m\) to \(x_f = 3.0 m\).
